title.narrative: Bangladesh - Employment Generation Program for the Poorest

description.narrative: To provide short-term employment on community sub-projects to enable households to better cope with vulnerability, while strengthening program implementation.

condition.narrative: Employ the services of a qualified procurement expert to assist the Recipient in carrying out the procurement process under theProject in the first twelve months of the Project
Maintain a Technical ProjectReview Committee, headed by the Project Director, to assist in Project and Program implementation inaccordance to the Finance Agreement
National Steering Committee, headed by the Secretary, Disaster Managementand Relief Division, to provide policy advice andoversight for effective project implementation
Project will set up the Project Director's Office including the recruitment of necessary project staff for project implementation
